troubleshooting.title: Engine Fails to Start
troubleshooting.shortdesc: When the engine fails to start despite the starting motor turning the crankshaft, the issue lies outside the starting system.

condition.p: Starting motor turns the crankshaft but engine does not start.

cause.p: The problem is not in the starting system but may be related to the carburetor or ignition system.

step.cmd: Release the starter button immediately to prevent battery discharge.
